item.title: Cash
item.author: rinetd@163.com (rinetd)
item.description:
-- Cross-platform Linux commands in pure ES6
Cash is a cross-platform implementation of Unix shell commands written in straight ES6. No native compiling and no external dependencies. While young, Cash aims to offer an alternative Linux feel on Windows and to open the door to cross-platform bash scripting in a Javascript environment. > npm install cash -g > cash $ Woah.
